LanguageData.OE_Footwear_Military.label: obsidia military boots
LanguageData.OE_Footwear_Military.description: Military boots, perfectly protects and providing advanced skin sense feedback to the wearer. Designed for use by all Obsidia Empire militaries.
LanguageData.OE_Footwear_Worker.label: obsidia worker boots
LanguageData.OE_Footwear_Worker.description: Worker boots, good protects and providing performance improvement to the wearer. Designed for use by all Obsidia Empire workers.

LanguageData.OE_Handwear_Worker.label: obsidia worker gloves
